title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Broadcast Statement Following the Death of HM Queen Elizabeth II
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 8 September 2022.
content:
Today we mourn the passing of a remarkable sovereign.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
